texto: 4.5 Process capability determination context The procedure for process capability determination is described in ISO/IEC TR 15504-8. Process capability determination is mainly built upon process assessment as described in the ISO/IEC TR 15504-3. Processes are rated against an assessment model or models compatible with the reference model defined in ISO/IEC TR 15504-2, and results are expressed using the measurement and rating framework included in the reference model.
